name: F-16 Multirole Fighter
description: With innovative technologies such as fly-by-wire controls, sophisticated systems for night and all-weather operations and the ability to carry a variety of weapons, the F-16 continually proves to be the workhorse of the USAF. Victorious in all of its air-to-air engagements, the awesome reputation of the F-16 is undisputed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000, XP Processor: Pentium 266MHz or better Memory: 32MB minimum Graphics: Direct3D compliant Hard Drive: 395MB Free Sound: DirectX compliant

reviews.review_text: Another addition to the simulator genre, this one lets you pilot the F-16 Multirole Fighter I'm unsure what made NovaLogic stop developing these types of games but they should have made more. This is a worthy addition to anyone who enjoys simulators.
